examplePhrases: Alexa ask tech facts for a fact
Alexa tell tech facts to tell me trivia
en-AU.name: tech Facts
en-AU.description:
Ask for tech Facts, and learn about what really matters, like bits and bytes.

Tech Facts provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Tech Facts" or "Alexa, open Tech Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
